```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(coronavirus)
library(lubridate)
```

```{r}
data(coronavirus)
```

```{r}
panama <- coronavirus %>%
  filter(country == "Panama")
```

# Cases

```{r}
panama_confirmed <- panama %>%
  filter(type == "confirmed")
```

```{r}
confirmed_yr_mth <- panama_confirmed %>%
  mutate(Year = year(date), Month = month(date, label = TRUE)) %>%
  group_by(Year, Month) %>%
  tally(cases) %>%
  rename(Cases = n)
```
